item.title: A quick way to automate your conda uninstalls
item.description: It’s been a while since my last article, truth be told it was an over-demanding set of months for me and not only in my professional life. One of the best things though, I have done during this past period was to submit a chapter to First year in code (Thanks Isaac for the opportunity :) ) Today, I am gonna showcase a python script I made, to help you uninstall all the anaconda packages that match a certain filter.
